keyPolicies.policyDescription: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low paid workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families. They will fight for a fair financial deal, with community banks, credit unions and mutuals providing realistic loans to families and small businesses.

Green MPs will press for a free insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs. Green Party councillors have already pioneered such a scheme in Kirklees.

issues.economy: Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low paid workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families.
issues.environment: Green MPs will press for a free insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs.

images.caption: A 'Living Wage' for all - Green MPs will demand a 'Living Wage' to ensure low paid workers earn enough to provide for themselves and their families.
A million new jobs - Green MPs will press for a free insulation scheme for every single home as part of a green package to cut fuel bills and create a million new jobs.
